name: Doctrine Zend Forms
short_description: Modification for Doctrine ORM 1.2.2 that generates Zend Forms ready to be used in your controllers. The forms generated with this bridge accept population with Doctrine Records and return Doctrine Records wich can be saved with a single line of code.
